de.lessvoid.coregl

Class CoreTexture2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.coregl.CoreTexture2D

  • public class CoreTexture2D
extends Object
    The CoreTexture2D represents a 2D texture in OpenGL space.

    This class takes care for loading the texture to OpenGL and for generating mipmaps as needed.

    This class does not handle proxy textures.

    Author:
    Martin Karing <nitram@illarion.org>

        Create an empty texture.
        Parameters:
        format - the ColorFormat for the texture
        dataType - the data type you'll later send the pixel data
        width - the width of the texture
        height - the height of the texture
        filter - the ResizeFilter to use
        Returns:
        the new allocated CoreTexture2D
